title: Using Maplebear Inc. (ticker: CART) shareholder letters on quarterly and annual results determine the quarter in FY2024 with the largest beat of actual Gross Transaction Value relative guidance. Use midpoints of guidance ranges in your calculations. Format the answer as: "[X]Q FY 2024, [X.XX] % Beat"
description:
1) Extract quarterly GTV guidance ranges from quarterly shareholder letters for each quarter of FY2024 (located in the section "QXâ€™24 Financial Outlook" of letter):
 Q1: $8000 -$8200M
 Q2: $8000 - $8150M
 Q3: $8100 - $8250M
 Q4: $8500 - $8650M
 
 2) Calculate midpoints (as sum of lower and upper limit of the guidance range divided by 2):
 Q1: ($8000 +$8200M) /2 = $8100M
 Q2: ( $8000 + $8150M) /2 = $8075M
 Q3: ($8100 + $8250M) /2 = $8175M
 Q4: ($8500 + $8650M) /2 = $8575M
 
 3) Extract actual quarterly GTVs for each quarter of FY2024:
 1Q: $8319M
 2Q: $8194M
 3Q: $8303M
 4Q: $8645
 
 4) Calculate beat/miss relative to midpoint for each Q:
 1Q: $8319M / $8100M - 1 = 2.7%
 2Q: $8194M / $8075M -1 = 1.5%
 3Q: $8303M / $8175M -1 = 1.6%
 4Q: $8645M / $8575M -1 = 0.8%
  
 5) Find the largest value of the beat and determine the number of corresponding quarter. 1Q has the largest beat, so the answer is: "1Q FY 2024, 2.70 % Beat"

rubric.criteria: Q1 guidance range (located in 4Q'FY23 shareholder letter): $8000 -$8200M
Q2 guidance range (located in 1Q'FY24 shareholder letter): $8000 - $8150M
Q3 guidance range (located in 2Q'FY24 shareholder letter): $8100 - $8250M
Q4 guidance range (located in 3Q'FY24 shareholder letter): $8500 - $8650M
Q1 actual GTV (located in 1Q'FY24 shareholder letter): $8319M
Q2 actual GTV(located in 2Q'FY24 shareholder letter): $8194M
Q3 actual GTV(located in 3Q'FY24 shareholder letter): $8303M
Q4 actual GTV(located in 4Q'FY24 shareholder letter): $8645
